select m.poster_path , m.movie_id , m.title , m.release_year , c.comment , r.rating , c.write_time , c.reply_cnt , c.comment_id from movie m join comment c on c.movie_id = m.movie_id left join rating r on r.movie_id = c.movie_id and r.user_id=#{user_id} where c.user_id = #{user_id} order by ${sortType} desc;

SELECT b.profile_img , a.nickname , c.comment_id , c.comment , c.write_time , c.views , c.reply_cnt , c.user_id , c.movie_id , COALESCE(r.rating, 0.0) AS rating FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN comment c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON r.user_id = a.user_id and r.movie_id = c.movie_id where c.movie_id = #{movie_id} order by ${sortType} desc;

SELECT b.profile_img , a.nickname , c.comment_id , c.comment , c.write_time , c.views , c.reply_cnt , c.user_id , c.movie_id , COALESCE(r.rating, 0.0) AS rating FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN comment c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON r.user_id = a.user_id and r.movie_id = c.movie_id where c.movie_id = #{movie_id} order by c.write_time desc;

SELECT b.profile_img , a.nickname , c.comment_id , c.comment , c.write_time , c.views , c.reply_cnt , c.user_id , c.movie_id , COALESCE(r.rating, 0.0) AS rating FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN comment c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN rating r ON r.user_id = a.user_id and r.movie_id=c.movie_id WHERE c.movie_id = #{movie_id} AND (LOWER(a.nickname) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchKeyword}), '%') OR LOWER(c.comment) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(#{searchKeyword}), '%')) ORDER BY c.views DESC;

SELECT b.profile_img , a.nickname , c.comment_id , c.comment , c.reply_cnt , MAX(c.write_time) AS write_time , MAX(c.views) AS views , MAX(c.user_id) AS user_id , MAX(c.movie_id) AS movie_id , COALESCE(MAX(r.rating), 0.0) AS rating FROM user a JOIN user_detail b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN comment c ON c.user_id = a.user_id AND c.movie_id = #{movie_id} LEFT JOIN rating r ON r.user_id = a.user_id AND r.movie_id = #{movie_id} GROUP BY b.profile_img , a.nickname , c.comment_id , c.comment , c.reply_cnt ORDER BY MAX(c.reply_cnt) DESC , c.WRITE_TIME DESC;
